snippet.title: Phylakterion Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Phylakterion will be available on Steam early 2022. Wishlist now!

Phylakterion is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game in which you’ll enter different locations in search of a possessed vessel. Search, Identify, and Destroy the vessel and the entity inhabiting it – before the entity finds YOU! 

Early Access Features:

• 3-step exorcism: Search, identify, destroy!
•  5 different locations: Explore a city apartment, an abandoned mansion, a haunted police station and more!
•  7 different tools: You’ll need ghost hunting equipment, like Geiger-counters, cameras, or notebooks, to locate the vessel, identify the ghost possessing it, and destroy it!
•  1-4 players: play alone or with your friends.
•  Unique entities: Stay alert and adjust your strategy to the situation, as every entity behaves differently.
•  Afterlife: You might die if you’re not careful, but you can still be helpful to your team!
